DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect the prevalence of geriatric syndrome, which is recognized by an internist, and to compare the data based on the comprehensive geriatric assessment by a geriatrician. The secondary outcome is to develop a practical collected form for the internist.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence and Recognition of Geriatric Syndrome in Outpatient Clinic at Srinagarind Hospital
DOC.criteria: all patients who are over than 60 years old who visit internal medicine outpatient clinic
